subject: I am Mr. james Royce, CEO  "
body:
I am Mr. james Royce, CEO  "MDV INCORPORATED", a premier
financial consultancy firm based in Ohio, United States. I am
contacting you based on my personal interest to develop a mutual
business relationship with you in your Country. I am a financial
consultant to an investor from a Mineral-Oil Rich European Country
with sensitive political background who wants to invest outside his
Country and without the appearance of his name on the investments.
 As stated above, my client had approached me with a mandate to seek
for individuals with professional experience in financial management
that can help him channel these funds into profitable investments
where these funds could exist outside his name and Country.
 Should this be of interest to you, kindly respond with your CV and/or
personal profile so we can discuss further. Kindly send your reply to
my private email for more comprehensive details.
 Here is my private email:jamesroyce002@gmail.com
 Sincerely,
 Mr. james Royce

subject: Re:   I am Mr. james Royce, CEO  "
body:
Hello Mr. James Royce,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. It's quite intriguing to hear about your client's interest in investing outside of his country. I'm curious, what kind of business sectors is he particularly interested in? 

Also, could you please provide more information about the nature of the investment? What are the expected returns and what would be my role in managing these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Clarence
